data.app_name: The Pirate Queen with Lucy Liu
data.description:
Embark on an epic journey through the turbulent waters of history in "The Pirate Queen", with Lucy Liu üåü

![{"height":224,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38982662_7513468888773292_7586277367396825871_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=LksNw2VyGNsQ7kNvgGfI2Qq&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYAeh6q5f10YgyEJN-8AJe3XqwfKuj0HHPL3EDU1W4n4lA&oe=665C581C)

Step into the boots of the legendary pirate Cheng Shih and see if you have what it takes to become history's most powerful pirate  üè¥‚Äç‚ò†Ô∏è


![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39036653_1456869748359051_7076517034930849202_n.png?_nc_cat=111&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=bg4O-7ypXToQ7kNvgELX5M5&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYDcH8DL-x26tK1ueaLQM70fuZHPlQsCJZDNHeRu7xxVwA&oe=665C61A4)


Travel back in time with this immersive story, perfect for explorers of all ages. Whether you're seeking a fresh adventure, yearning to escape into another world, or eager to unearth a hidden gem from history, this legend is for you.

![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39003263_961033948683270_8273646164126363713_n.png?_nc_cat=111&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=BrPGHgLXrgEQ7kNvgEscY0u&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYDwO5itZ_JvXr8-7NPyrhvnzQwfjT-r7lSuYz4OKwLzIA&oe=665C4907)

With light gameplay elements, the focus is on the narrative. Dive into a story-rich experience lasting 1-4 hours ‚è≥, climb rigging, explore moonlit cabins üåô, unearth hidden artefacts, and exercise your wit to become leader of the Red Flag Fleet.  

![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39031579_801519894943640_3850714342256227051_n.png?_nc_cat=100&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=DXov9V5AsCQQ7kNvgGEF0F4&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYAzHGI1Q7wxUap3rwvEM-mmqiFULlhdc3sgcwK4WgNmiQ&oe=665C3BE6)

![{"height":231,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39031400_1653444588750690_8451663376835143463_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=zZ2HFKOcY54Q7kNvgFaWRuH&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYDh9sNSsVCZs8F2BINGZuEke3is-5ixaUiIUF5cFqP11w&oe=665C6858)

Celebrated for its cinematic story and historical environments, this non-combat experience has earned critical acclaim, winning the Tribeca Storyscapes Award (2023) & the Raindance Discovery Award (2021) üèÜ

![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75322595_315227141608157_6664541123259039926_n.png?_nc_cat=104&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=YUxsIInYzsYQ7kNvgGGwmwP&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYBNUOvQo_b5ze2N80CyMrvuzRRCCHuOiXYt5AxpkzGtlw&oe=665C64D9)


![{"height":225,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38974820_419365674368364_6471370540204954427_n.png?_nc_cat=106&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=xM0mPbjJQy0Q7kNvgFBZH21&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYBKzNO9DNf0Q8Uf3qf0Il4FXsyXXY7ZxwuajdM5zZKFxg&oe=665C4AF0)

Experience the captivating performance from Hollywood actress Lucy Liu üé≠, who brings Cheng Shih's character to life, under the direction of critically acclaimed filmmaker and creative director Eloise Singer üé¨


![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/57569455_779145490949371_5639970595016054333_n.png?_nc_cat=102&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=gkKG71mngrsQ7kNvgGNLXkJ&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYC70nLJSfRxaZDDGfF8GyhW_Evp1jA53xTyR5hLDC2ZFg&oe=665C356A)

![{"height":244,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75593949_1392764491611640_7662168618929982906_n.png?_nc_cat=108&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=Dicz_RDYBmoQ7kNvgEWMtsS&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYDDvXDx4yO9Cxc7ulPlja92V1lUh4AkxX-r1F9AVZWZiA&oe=665C4917)

Are you ready to turn the tides of history? Let's see how well you fare as The Pirate Queen! üè¥‚Äç‚ò†Ô∏èüëë



![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75251817_478868781249664_4666816330504461518_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=hyw0FNQFBh0Q7kNvgGCEpTi&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYCkXDbjdnpTjXLQPAtfhFZz7zKwVtG-Kzl2tEn1R4sing&oe=665C648C)
